title: Superhuman
description:
Superhuman is the most productive email app ever made. Fly through your inbox, with powerful AI features for writing, summarizing, replying, and searching. Be more responsive to what matters most, with Split Inbox and follow-up Reminders. And collaborate faster than ever before, with Team Comments. 

Superhuman works seamlessly with Gmail and Outlook, and helps teams save four hours per person, every single week.
